title: Exercises vpon the first Psalme Both in prose and verse. By Geo: Wither, of the Societie of Lincolnes Inne.
author: Wither, George, 1588-1667.
publisher: Printed by Edw. Griffin, for Iohn Harrison, and are to be sold at his shop, in Pater Noster Row, at the signe of the Golden Vnicorne,
notes: Includes a verse paraphrase of Ecclesiastes XII, 1-8.
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
